title: The Most Powerful Mage With Zero Magic Power – I Knew Your Magic Theory Was Wrong, Didn’t I? 〜 - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Harem   School Life
tags: Academy   Bookworm   Elemental Magic   Fantasy World   Hard-Working Protagonist   Lost Civilizations   Magic   Male Protagonist   Masochistic Characters   Naive Protagonist   Younger Sisters
author: Kitagawa Nikita   北川ニキタ
description:
Abel wanted to be a mage.

When he was seven years old, he was told that he could not become a mage because he had no magical power.

Shocked, Abel became a recluse.

Because of this, Abel was expelled from his parents’ house.

Even so, Abel continues to study magic.

And then he realised;

That the magic theories known in this world are fundamentally wrong.

After realizing the truth of magic, Abel becomes the strongest  among them.>
